title: Environmental complaint insights through text mining based on the driver, pressure, state, impact, and response (DPSIR) framework: Evidence from an Italian environmental agency
content:
Publication date: September 2023

Source: Regional Sustainability, Volume 4, Issue 3

Author(s): Fabiana Manservisi, Michele Banzi, Tomaso Tonelli, Paolo Veronesi, Susanna Ricci, Damiano Distante, Stefano Faralli, Giuseppe Bortone
